author: IBM
description: Leverage the power of DOcloud directly from your Microsoft Excel workbook.
name: DOcloud Call from Excel

author: IBM
description: A desktop application using a Java client to iteratively solve a multi-model problem with a column generation algorithm. Bulk rolls of sheet metal are cut into rolls of different widths, minimizing the number of rolls that need to be sliced.
name: DOcloud Cutting Stock Java Sample

author: IBM
description: A web application that demonstrates how to solve a transportation optimization problem, integrating the IBM DOcloud Java client with data stored in MongoDB and using a web front end developed with AngularJS.
name: DOcloud GreenTruck sample

author: IBM
description: This sample shows how to use the DOcloud parallel solve feature (only available with a Reserved Bare Metal subscription).
name: DOcloud parallel solve sample

author: IBM
description: These samples demonstrate how to use the Python Client to submit a problem to the IBM Decision Optimization on Cloud service.
name: DOcloud Python client samples

author: IBM
description: A desktop application that demonstrates how to solve a transportation optimization problem, integrating the IBM DOcloud Java client with a simple Java application where data and results are streamed back and forth.
name: DOcloud Trucking Java sample
